contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 28, 1954 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest 1st CWS Manchester, 2nd Munn and Felton, 3rd Scottish CWS. Hymn tune 1st Munn and Felton, 2nd CWS Manchester, 3rd Ferodo Works. Deportment 1st Munn and Felton, 2nd Clayton Aniline, 3rd CWS Manchester. 6th annual contest. 10 bands competed
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:10 p.m. April 20, 2019, 7:20 p.m.
1 City of Manchester Alex Mortimer Freedom (Brass Band Symphony No. 1)
2 The GUS Band Stanley Boddington Diadem of Gold
3 Ferodo Works Band George Hespe Freedom (Brass Band Symphony No. 1)
4 YEWCO Albert Lunn Scena Sinfonica
5 Cooperation Band Enoch Jackson Oliver Cromwell
6 Clayton Aniline Edward Buttress Resurgam
7 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne Oliver Cromwell
8 Clydebank Burgh Band John Hoggans An Epic Symphony
9 Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd John Faulds Bayreuth
10 Newmains R. S. Dow Prometheus Unbound
